name: CHIMERA I
description: We introduce CHIMERA series to NFT market. This series of digital paintings explores spatial qualities of surface, texture and geometry, and stems out of a years long research project INTERFACE. A creature from outer space, each CHIMERA is a unique digital drawing that brings architectural space into abstract dimension. The link to a full size high resolution PDF file will be provided upon collection. The size of high resolution downloadable image is minimum A2 printable format.
